title: Tuning In To My Surroundings
description: This relaxing mindfulness meditation runs for about 15 mins and helps you tune in to your surroundings. We become aware of things "just as they are" and we learn to accept things "just as they are "in our lives.

title: Soften & Relax - Belly Breathing
description: Belly breathing is a deep breathing technique that engages your diaphragm. It is a short rejuvenating practice. which can lower your stress levels. It can calm the nervous system and stay present. You can do this practice sitting on a chair or lying down in a comfortable position.

title: Learning To Observe Your Thoughts
description: This is a very short mindfulness meditation ( approx 6 mins) to help you become aware of your thoughts. We are teaching ourselves to become "the observer" of our own thoughts. This exercise can help us to stay focussed and not allow ourselves to become distracted.

title: Learning To Relax
description: This is a short body awareness practice that is done sitting upright in a comfortable position. It is a practice that is great for unwinding after a busy day. It can help evoke a relaxation response and reduce stress.

title: Mindfulness Of Body
description: This meditation offers a powerful way to tune in to your present-moment experience with your body. You can learn to be mindful of the points of contact of your body anytime — in meditation or throughout your daily life. The body sensations are generally easy to feel, making this an ideal practice for beginners to mindfulness.

title: I Am What I Am
description: A reminder that we are the I AM.

title: Wahe Guru
description: A mantra meditation for clearing your arcline and past karma. Composed & arranged by Aykanna. PURJUS publishing/ASCAP.

title: Effortless Connection With Your Self
description: In this guided effortless mediation, we slow down and tune into our ever-present breath before slowly winding down the stress levels within our bodies. In this simple practice, we sit with ourselves and rest our awareness on the rhythm of our own bodies.

title: Self-Love And Kindness For The Body
description: Beginning with easy breathing and a focussed body scan, the listener is guided to a place of love, admiration and awe for their body. The practice is effortless in nature and suitable for all levels of meditation experience.

title: An Effortlessly Happy Place
description: Beginning with easy breathing and a focussed body scan, the listener is guided through a visualisation of a time they felt happy, safe, and content in front of a fire. Perfect for self-acceptance and confidence, the practice is effortless and suitable for all levels of meditation experience.

title: Learn to Relax & Sleep
description: This is a Heartfulness Guided Relaxation. This will help relax various parts of the body and prepare you for meditation. This practice can also be used before going to bed to improve your quality of sleep and help with your peace of mind.

title: Introduction To Cleaning And Rejuvination
description: Heartfulness Cleaning Meditation is done in the evenings, or after all the days work is completed as means of relaxing or centering yourself. This meditation is typically done for 15 to 30 minutes, however, can also be taken for a short time duration. During this cleaning practice, we use our will to remove stress, tension, and negative vibrations, impressions or impurities, from the physical and energetic body.

title: Connecting With Our Inner Self
description: In this final meditation class, led by renowned spiritual teacher, Daaji, you will learn to connect with your Inner Self by listening to the heart’s voice. As this practice invites you to make a constant and deep connection with the heart, you will allow yourself to observe your deepest feelings, make wise choices and weave your destiny. Use this practice to gain a newfound sense of Self compassion, love and wisdom.

title: Learn To Meditate On Heartfulness
description: "Experience is the gold that backs the currency of knowledge." Without experience, all knowledge stays abstract and hollow. This is a guided Heartfulness Meditation with Yogic Transmission. Heartfulness is a path of experiencing our inner Self, through teaching us to dive deep into our heart, and be in a natural state of love, peace, and calmness. This practice allows you to experience lightness, clarity and balance in the heart.

description:
כשיושביםות לתרגל - צריך להבין מה התרגול שנכון לי עכשיו? 
התרגול הזה נועד לזמנים בהם התודעה עצבנית, חסרת מנוחה. כשיש בתוכנו אנרגיה תזזיתית צריך תרגול ששם דגש על הרגעה, קבלה, רכות ונוחות

כל דבר שאנחנו חוזרים עליו שוב ושוב הופך להיות הרגל. מה שאנחנו מתאמנים בו, גדל ומתחזק. אפשר לאמן את עצמנו להיות טובים/ות לעצמנו.

title: מדיטציה לחציית שטפון
description:
איך שוחים במים סוערים? באחת מדרשות הבודהה מדבר על השטפון החזקה שעובר עלינו בשעת כעס או בלבול. במדיטציה הזאת נתרגל לשים לב כשאנחנו נסחפים/ות, ומה לעשות ברגעים האלה. 

״אדוני היקר, איך הצלחת לחצות את השיטפון

"מבלי להשתהות ומבלי לדחוף בכוח, כך חציתי את השיטפון."

"אבל איך אדוני היקר, מבלי להשתהות ומבלי לדחוף בכוח, חצית את השיטפון?"

"חבר, כאשר עמדתי מלכת, שקעתי.
כאשר דחפתי בכוח, נסחפתי."
"כך חבר, מבלי להשתהות ומבלי לדחוף בכוח,
חציתי את השיטפון."

title: אימון ב אי-מאמץ
description:
תרגול תשומת הלב עם הנשימה מספק לנו הזדמנותלהביא תשומת לב סקרנית וידידותית אל הדברים כפי שהם מתגלים מרגע לרגע, בלי המעמסה של החובה לשנות אותם. אין שום מטרה להשיג, חוץ מלהביא את תשומת הלב הפתוחה לחוויה. 
ֿמכוונים את הכוונה שלנו להרגיע ולייצב את המיינד ומניחות את התשומת לב על הנשימה. ברגע שתתחילו לתרגל נפגוש את מוח הקוף-כשמחשבות ורגשות קופצות בלי שליטה. זה נורמלי וצפוי,  פשוט צריך אימון בהתמקדות ויציבות ערה ונלמד לעשות את זה על ידי חזרה בפשטות אל הנשימה שלנו והגוף שלנו כשנבחין שנדדנו.

title: כל מה שצריך נמצא כאן ועכשיו - מדיטציה פשוטה
description:
מחשבות, רגשות, צלילים, ווטסאפ, נטפליקס, ריבים, משימות, עבודה, יחסים, אין סוף. התרגול הזה מאפשר לנו לעצור, להתמקד, לאסוף את תשומת הלב והתודעה ולנוח על תחושת הנשימה.

הנשימה מלווה אותנו מרגע הלידה ועד הנשימה האחרונה שלנו, ולכן נוכל לסמוך עליה - שכל מה שאנחנו אי פעם נצטרך נמצא כאן ועכשיו.

title: מ.א.ה - מיני מדיטציה
description:
מ: מפגש, מה שלומי, מה קורה בתוכי עכשיו
א: איסוף של התודעה אל הנשימה עמוק בגופי
ה: התרחבות מהנשימה אל כל הגוף הנושם וכל מה שקיים בי

תרגול קצר שאפשר לעשות בכל מקום. אפשר לעשות אותו במשך שלוש דקות, וגם במשך שניות בודדות - בעיניים עצומות או פקוחות. מורכב מ3 שלבים שאני מציע ללמוד בע״פ ככה שיוכל לשמש אותנו כשנזדקק לו.  צעד בונוס - פעולה: אחרי שפגשתי את עצמי בשלושת השלבים, אפשר לשאול מה אני עלי לעשות כדי לטפל בעצמי עכשיו?

title: לא בא לי לתרגל - איך לא להיות סלע בנהר החיים
description:
הלא-תרגול הזה מתחיל בפעמון הסיום. אין מה להתאמץ. אין מה לעשות. אין מה להשיג. אין לאן להגיע. אין מי להיות. אפשר להפסיק.
כשלא בא לנו לתרגל זה אומר אפשר לשאול מה בא לי שיפסיק? במה אני נלחם? ולהפסיק להלחם ולהתאמץ. 
נהר החיים זורם וכל מה שיש לנו לעשות זה לא להיות סלעים בתוכו.

title: Training The Puppy - Meditation For Beginners
description: This short practice begins with an explanation of meditation and continues with a short meditation. There are many misconceptions about meditation, that it is not appropriate for calm people, That the goal is not to think. title: Sun, Shade, & The Shifting Nature Of Happiness On The Path
description: What we consider happiness, or "sukha", shifts as we progress on the spiritual path. As we gain insight, old, more coarse, pleasures lose their appeal and the more sublime joys of meditation, morality, and love take their place.

title: A Buddhist Conception Of Grace
description: The Four Noble Truths of Buddhism provide a framework for understanding the traditionally Christian concept of grace. Only by comprehending our suffering, the directive of the First Noble Truth, can we enter into the grace of release.

title: Discipline & Dhamma; Temple & Light
description: Discipline in meditation and morality is an essential part of the spiritual path, but only if held in balance with the other qualities, such as creativity, rejoicing, and loving-kindness. Just as temple walls protect sacred space, so discipline protects the more sublime qualities of the mind.

title: Wind Touching Water: Mindfulness Of Breathing (Part 2)
description: A detailed overview of breath meditation as described in the Ānāpānasati, or "Mindfulness of Breathing" sutta. New scholarship shows the teaching to be an invitation to explore the subtle energies of the body in an engaged manner that works with, rather than against, the thinking mind.

title: Mourning & Daybreak
description: The path of practice and meditation allows us to approach and deal with the great loss inherent in life. Along with the First Noble Truth's directive to turn towards and comprehend our pain, the Buddhist path provides numerous other resources, such as the joy of samadhi.

title: Dependent Origination & Ignorance
description: Our ignorance of the true nature of our experience leads us to grasp suffering time and again. Only through practice can we begin to see clearly and abandon the cause of stress. The Buddha's concept of Dependent Origination provides a framework through which we can develop such wisdom.

title: Wind Touching Water: Mindfulness Of Breathing (Part 1)
description: A detailed overview of breath meditation as described in the Ānāpānasati, or "Mindfulness of Breathing" sutta. New scholarship shows the teaching to be an invitation to explore the subtle energies of the body in an engaged manner that works with, rather than against, the thinking mind.

title: Mindfulness Of Breathing (Part 1)
description: A detailed overview of breath meditation as described in the Ānāpānasati, or "Mindfulness of Breathing" sutta given during a daylong retreat at Empty Cloud Monastery. New scholarship by Bhante Analayo and others points to an interpretation of the teaching as an invitation to explore the subtle energies of the body in an engaged manner that works with, rather than against, the thinking mind.

title: Pain, Pleasure & Beyond
description: Moving towards the more refined forms of happiness praised by the Buddha allows us to cultivate a sense of well-being that is more robust, stable, and sweet than all we’ve known before. This is the fruit of the Buddhist path.

title: Purity Of Purpose & The Eight Thoughts Of A Great Being
description: In "The Eight Thoughts of a Great Being", the Buddha elaborates on the qualities that characterize the pure heart, such as humility, mindfulness, and wisdom. Recollecting these traits can bring us closer to awakening.

title: Wind Touching Water: Mindfulness Of Breathing (Part 4)
description: A detailed overview of breath meditation as described in the Ānāpānasati, or "Mindfulness of Breathing" sutta. New scholarship shows the teaching to be an invitation to explore the subtle energies of the body in an engaged manner that works with, rather than against, the thinking mind.

title: The Drum Of The Deathless & Specific Conditionality
description: In numerous discourses, the Buddha points to the "stability" of the natural processes that lead to phenomena arising. As we practice, we begin to see the world as a process rather than a collection of stable entities and begin to find refuge in the natural rule governing experience.

title: Choosing A Teacher And The Patron Saints Of Buddhism Q & A
description: In this Q&A session, Tan Nisabho speaks about the considerations we should take into account when selecting a teacher and the different roles of teachers in our lives as exemplified by the great disciples of the Buddha.

title: Wind Touching Water: Mindfulness Of Breathing (Part 3)

New scholarship shows the teaching to be an invitation to explore the subtle energies of the body in an engaged manner that works with, rather than against, the thinking mind.

title: Eight Thoughts Of A Great Being (Part 1)
description: In this talk, Ven. Nisabho speaks about the first four of the eight thoughts of a great being described by the Buddha in AN 8:30. From developing humility to fostering energy, specific practices can help us shape ourselves into better vessels of meaning, purpose, and compassion.

title: Mindfulness Of Breathing (Part 3)
description: A detailed overview of breath meditation as described in the Ānāpānasati, or "Mindfulness of Breathing" sutta given during a daylong retreat at Empty Cloud Monastery. title: Mindfulness Of Breathing (Part 2)
description: A detailed overview of breath meditation as described in the Ānāpānasati, or "Mindfulness of Breathing" sutta given during a daylong retreat at Empty Cloud Monastery. title: The Triple Gem, The Gulag, & A Canopy Of Meaning
description: The "Triple Gem" of Buddhism - the Buddha, the Dhamma, and the Sangha - can also be thought about as undeluded awareness, truth, and its manifestation in the world. Such a conception allows one to find refuge even in the most difficult of circumstances.

title: The Bird Of The Breath
description: In this talk, Ajahn Nisabho describes the practical steps of breath meditation outlined in the Anapanasati Sutta, or Discourse on Mindfulness of Breathing. The steps provide practical guidance in how to bring the mind to calm and a state of peace.

title: Breathing, Music, & The Final Tetrads
description: In this talk, Ajahn Nisabho speaks about the practice of ānāpānasati, or mindfulness of breathing, as outlined in the Buddha's original teaching, using the analogy of music to deepen understanding.

title: Autocompaixão

title: DNA Activation
description: DNA is the ‘blueprint of life‘ and is located in every cell of our bodies. Our DNA contains large amounts of data, though the majority of it is considered 'junk'. But what if this data isn’t junk, but actually dormant and encoded with information that can unlock the full divine potential of humanity? It is now proven that we have 12 strands of DNA. This Energy Healing track helps you to activate your 10 dormant strands of physical DNA. From there, you can then activate your spiritual DNA.

title: Clear Confusion & Overwhelm & Shift To Higher Frequencies
description: In a fast-paced world where confusion and overwhelm become a state of being that leads to stress, fear, worry, anxiety, and emotional and physical pain it is more important than ever to slow down on all levels and find back to our centre of peace and joy. Blessings, Antje

title: De bodyscan

title: De 3 minuten ademruimte
description: De 3 minuten ademruimte is een korte oefening die je in het dagelijks leven makkelijk kunt gebruiken. Het is een oefening uit de 8 weekse Mindfulness Based Stress Reduction training. De aandacht volgt een soort zandlopervorm, van brede aandacht, naar smal en vervolgens weer breed.

title: Liggende mindful yoga oefeningen

title: Morning Meditation: Stairway To The Sun
description:
Start your day awakening into presence and vitality. Bring spaciousness into your mind and energy into your body. This practice is a gentle yet powerful combination of moderate breathwork and visualization, designed to help you move into your day with intention, stability, energy, and inspiration.

Recorded at Camp Cortez Studio (Los Angeles, CA).

title: Self-Regulation & Holistic Awareness
description: A simple, guided practice to self-regulate during challenging times, and to increase awareness of your physical, emotional, and mental bodies at any time. Pause, connect with your experience, and leave with a greater sense of presence, stability, and agency.

title: Active Imagination: Elemental Woman
description: Guided Active Imagination Practice for Women. Elemental Self: Each of us possesses all of the four elements within our bodies. Having them manifest too much or too little can bring challenges to our physical, mental, and emotional health. In this meditation, informed by your inner wisdom and imagination, you will have the chance to assess how harmoniously the elements are manifesting within yourself currently. Get comfy and come on this journey with me!

title: Inner Child Wisdom: Active Imagination
description: Let your inner child reveal your spiritual wisdom. In this powerful and gentle active imagination practice, you will meet your inner child in a place of utter beauty. Access her wisdom to connect deeper with yourself and understand your needs and desires. Recorded at Camp Cortez Studio, Los Angeles.

title: Move-Breathe-Notice To Soothe Anxiety
description:
A practice to soothe feelings of anxiety and stress. We start with some conscious movement to release stagnant energy from the physical body. Then, we calm the central nervous system with a few minutes of soft-belly breathing and finish with an easy and fun consciousness practice to connect you with your surroundings and bring you deeper into the here and now. 

The soft-belly breathing technique is based on the work by psychiatrist James S Gordon, MD. 

Recorded and edited at Camp Cortez Studio

title: Käesoleva hetke teadvustamine
description:
Luba endal põgus hetk, et saada teadlikumaks käesolevast hetkest. See on teadvelolek helidest, aistingutest kehas ja hingamisel. See aitab sul saada teadlikumaks ja olla rohkem kohal, lasta lahti tegutsemisest ja mõtisklemisest, lubades sulle kosutava hetke aktsepteerides käesolevat hetke nii nagu see parasjagu on ning tundes seda otseselt kogedes.

Allow yourself a brief moment to become aware of the present moment. This is a mindfulness of sounds, sensations in the body and breathing. It helps you to become more aware and present, let go off doing and thinking, giving you a nourishing moment of acceptance and embodied awareness.

title: Lühike hingetõmbepaus
description:
Lühike hingetõmbepaus igapäevahetkedes keskendumiseks, käesolevasse hetkesse häälestumiseks ning teadlikkuse praktiseerimiseks. Sobilik päevas korduvateks pausideks, kui tähelepanu on hajevil, vajad puhkepausi, värsket pilku käesolevale olukorrale.
Short breathingspace helping to focus, and become aware of the present moment. Great for short breaks when you're unfocused, need a nourishing break or fresh perspective of things.

title: Keha vaatlemise harjutus
description:
Keha vaatlemine on harjutus keskendumiseks, keha tunnetamiseks ja aktsepteerimiseks. Keha võib olla ankruks, et saabuda mõtete virr-varrist käesolevasse hetkesse, teadvustades nii aistinguid kui emotsioone, mis kehas tajutavad on.
Body Scan is a practice for focusing, becoming aware and accepting the body sensations. Body can allows our attention to be anchored in the present moment, noticing sensations and emotions in the body.

title: Kaastunde Jagamine Ja Vastuvõtmine
description: Heasoovlikkuse ja kaastundlikkuse jagamine iseendale ja teisele on võimalus kümmelda heasoovlikkus teadlikkuses. Vali just need juhised, mis Sind kõnetavad ning lase enda kogemusel olla iseenda õpetaja - jättes kõrvale need instruktsioonid, mis Sulle praegusel hetkel ei ole sobilikud. Luba sellel praktikal olla sama loomulik nagu hingamine.

title: Affectionate Breathing
description: Affectionate breathing is a guided meditation which invites you to practice accepting and loving mindfulness of the body and breath. Bringing a warm and friendly attention toward your body as you would toward a friend or a beloved being.

title: Self-Compassion Break
description: This guided practice invites you to validate your struggles and feelings in difficult moments with acceptance and mindfulness and to find ways to give to yourself what you really need when you are struggling. This is a guided practice from developed by Kristin Neff and part of Mindful Self-Compassion training.
